partitions.name: Query1
partitions.expression:
let
					Source = Sql.Database("your_server", "your_database"),
					SQL = Value.NativeQuery(Source, "SELECT
    ""MATERIAL_CHARGES"".""SITE_NUMBER"" AS ""SITE_NUMBER"",
    ""MATERIAL_CHARGES"".""ITEM_NUMBER"" AS ""ITEM_NUMBER"",
    ""MATERIAL_CHARGES"".""CHARGED_DATE"" AS ""CHARGED_DATE"",
    ""MATERIAL_CHARGES"".""TRANSACTION_TYPE"" AS ""TRANSACTION_TYPE""
FROM
""Database_Layer"".""MATERIAL_CHARGES""
WHERE
    [SITE_NUMBER]= ?SiteNumber?
    AND     [ITEM_NUMBER]=?ItemNumber?
    AND     [TRANSACTION_TYPE] is not null", null, [EnableFolding=true])
				in
					SQL
